comments.comments_text: Goal! Kevin De Bruyne (Manchester City) with a wonderful piece of finishing. He makes a yard for himself after a well-taken pass inside the box and strikes the ball into the top left corner.

comments.comments_text: Lee Peltier (Cardiff) can't expect anything else than a yellow card for his hard tackle. And a yellow it is. Jonathan Moss didn't think twice about pulling it out of his pocket. Manchester City have a free kick.

comments.comments_text: It's in! Gabriel Jesus spots his teammate in a good position on the edge of the box and provides him with a nice pass. Leroy Sane (Manchester City) doesn't think twice and rifles a first-time shot into the bottom right corner. The score is now 2:0.
